name: Anonymous (Thal_CGD)
description:
This is a game made by my team in Year 2 (may be the same game uploaded by each team member on here)

The story takes place in the quiet, run down underground station Aldwych. You play as a young brown rat who is trying to find their family.  As you start you are met with fear and confusion, being unsure where to go and having to traverse various obstacles.  Over the two levels you must navigate your way through various tunnels, learning more about where your family may have gone to and trying to make your way back to them. As you manage to piece together clues such as footprints or fur. You get to find out about where your family may have gone you will be able to figure out the puzzle of where to go.

Twitter: @PhantomEcho2 @Thal_CGD @CGDMelanie @Aceantt @SatrinaSharpe
